_documentation.description: This file stores all team achievements. Add new achievements by following the structure above.

fields.items: Array of achievements for that year
fields.competition: Name of the competition or event
fields.description: Brief description of the achievement (1-2 sentences)
fields.image: Path to achievement image (optional, relative to website root)
fields.date: Date of achievement in YYYY-MM-DD format (used for sorting)

tips: Add new years at the TOP of the achievements array to show most recent first
Images should be 16:9 aspect ratio, minimum 800px wide
Keep descriptions concise - they display on cards
Date field is optional but helps with accurate ordering
